```{r tab1, cache=cacheon}

tab1 <- print(CreateTableOne(
  vars = tabvars,
  strata = "sos_ddr_sglt2",
  data = rsdata
),
smd = TRUE,
missing = TRUE,
printToggle = FALSE,
nonnormal = tabvars,
catDigits = 1,
contDigits = 1,
noSpaces = TRUE,
explain = FALSE
)
tab1 <- as_tibble(cbind(var = rownames(tab1), tab1)) %>%
  select(-test) %>%
  select(var, Missing, everything())


tab1m <- print(CreateTableOne(
  vars = tabvars,
  strata = "sos_ddr_sglt2",
  data = matchrsdata
),
smd = TRUE,
missing = TRUE,
printToggle = FALSE,
nonnormal = tabvars,
catDigits = 1,
contDigits = 1,
noSpaces = TRUE,
explain = FALSE
)
tab1m <- as_tibble(cbind(var = rownames(tab1m), tab1m)) %>%
  select(-test) %>%
  select(var, Missing, everything())

tab1both <- bind_cols(tab1, tab1m %>% select(-var))

tab1both <- tab1both %>%
  # remove = Yes
  mutate(across(everything(), str_replace_all, fixed(" = Yes"), "")) %>%
  # to get labs and units in place
  mutate(
    var_tmp = str_split(var, " = ", simplify = TRUE)[, 1],
    val_tmp = str_split(var, " = ", simplify = TRUE)[, 2],
    # if recoding or categorizing will still get org label
    var_tmp2 = str_replace_all(var_tmp, "(_cat2|_cat)", ""),
    # if shf/sos combination  will still get org label
    var_tmp2 = str_replace_all(var_tmp2, "shf_sos_com_", "sos_com_")
  )

tab1both <- left_join(tab1both,
  meta_variables %>%
    select(variable, label, unit),
  by = c("var_tmp2" = "variable")
) %>%
  mutate(
    Variable = coalesce(label, var_tmp),
    Variable = if_else(!is.na(unit),
      paste0(Variable, " (", unit, ")"),
      Variable
    ),
    Variable = if_else(val_tmp != "",
      paste0(Variable, " ", val_tmp),
      Variable
    )
  )

# footnotes
tab1both <- tab1both %>%
  mutate(
    footnote1 = if_else(var_tmp %in% modvars, footnote_marker_number(1), ""),
    footnote2 = if_else(var_tmp == "shf_indexyearmonth_cat", footnote_marker_number(2), "")
  ) %>%
  unite(footnote, starts_with("footnote"), sep = "") %>%
  mutate(
    # so no probs
    Variable = sanitize_text(Variable),
    Variable = paste0(Variable, footnote),

    # space in Latex output (fix this other way?)
    Variable = sub("  ", ". ", Variable)
  ) %>%
  select(Variable, Missing...2:SMD...11)

## fix in order to use escape = TRUE
colnames(tab1both) <- sanitize_text(c("Variable", rep(c("Missing (%)", "No SGLT2i", "SGLT2i", "p-value", "SMD"), 2)))

write.xlsx(tab1both, paste0("./output/tabs/Baseline characteristics_", Sys.Date(), ".xlsx"), rowNames = FALSE)

footnote(
  default_kable(tab1both,
    font_size = 6,
    caption = "Baseline characteristics",
    longtable = TRUE,
    escape = FALSE
  ) %>%
    add_header_above(c(" " = 1, "All" = 5, "Matched" = 5)),
  general = c(
    "Categorical variables are presented with n (%) and tested with chi-square test and continuous variables with median [q1-q3] and tested with Kruskal-Wallis test."
  ),
  number = c(
    "Included in multiple imputation model and adjusted for in logistic/cox regression models",
    "Included as a continous variable in imputation and cox regression model and categorical in logistic regression models"
  )
)
```
